mapper.sql: id as id, category_code as categoryCode, category_name as categoryName, one_level_type as oneLevelType, code_generator as codeGenerator, prefix as prefix, suffix as suffix, length as length, width as width, high as high, volume as volume, weight as weight, length_grid_num as lengthGridNum, width_grid_num as widthGridNum, high_grid_num as highGridNum, total_grid_num as totalGridNum, grid_length as gridLength, grid_width as gridWidth, grid_high as gridHigh, grid_volume as gridVolume, picking_mode as pickingMode, ou_id as ouId, create_time as createTime, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, operator_id as operatorId, lifecycle as lifecycle
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_container_2nd_category ( id, category_code , category_name , one_level_type , code_generator , prefix , suffix , length , width , high , volume , weight , length_grid_num , width_grid_num , high_grid_num , total_grid_num , grid_length , grid_width , grid_high , grid_volume , picking_mode , ou_id , create_time , last_modify_time , operator_id , lifecycle ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{categoryCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{categoryName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{oneLevelType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{codeGenerator,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{prefix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{suffix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{length,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{width,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{high,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{volume,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{weight,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lengthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{widthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{highGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{totalGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{gridLength,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{gridWidth,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{gridHigh,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{gridVolume,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_container_2nd_category SET category_code = #{categoryCode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , category_name = #{categoryName,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , one_level_type = #{oneLevelType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , code_generator = #{codeGenerator,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , prefix = #{prefix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , suffix = #{suffix,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , length = #{length,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , width = #{width,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , high = #{high,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , volume = #{volume,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , weight = #{weight,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , length_grid_num = #{lengthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , width_grid_num = #{widthGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , high_grid_num = #{highGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , total_grid_num = #{totalGridNum,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , grid_length = #{gridLength,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_width = #{gridWidth,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_high = #{gridHigh,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , grid_volume = #{gridVolume,javaType=Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , picking_mode = #{pickingMode,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ou_id = #{ouId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , operator_id = #{operatorId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lifecycle = #{lifecycle,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id}
